title: Free Flu Shots
cleaned_text: | | | | Free Flu Shot Clinics Free Flu Shot Clinics offered by LA County Library LA County Department of Public Health is partnering with LA County Library to provide free flu vaccines to people 6 months of age and older, no health insurance required. We will have 11 flu shot clinics; see the schedule of remaining flu shot clinics on the right. Drive-through options available at select locations. Physical distancing, masking requirements, additional disinfecting and other measures will be in place at each free flu shot clinic location to prioritize the safety of our customers and staff. *Flu shots available while supplies last For a faster experience, please fill out the Flu Vaccine Information Flu vaccinations are recommended for all persons 6 months of age and over, including healthy children and adults. It is especially important to get a flu vaccine if you: Call your regular health care provider to see what other shots you may need. If you don't have a regular provider, call 2-1-1 (LA County Information Line) or visit Please Free Flu Shot Clinic by Kaiser Permanente Whether or not you are a Kaiser Permanente member, Kaiser invites you to join them at a no-cost flu shot clinic. All are welcome, so take your family and friends with you! These are all walk-in clinics and are open until at least November 14th: Mon-Fri, 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Mon-Fri, 7 am - 7 pm For more information, or other locations near you, visit Sincerely, Steven C. Bradford CA State Senator, SD 35 | | California State Senator Steven Bradford - District 35 | |
